text:
@WhiteHouse @FLOTUS @NIH Trump and The Republicans have now killed 25 times more Americans than were killed on 9/11 with their indifference to human suffering and sociopathic obsession with power.

9/11/2001 - 2,977 vs  5/07/2020 - 75,431
